# Inline Elements

## Image

Here is an inline image: ![alt text](placeholder.png)

## Span with Attributes

This is a [span with class]{.highlight} and this is a [span with ID]{#my-span} and this is a [span with custom attrs]{data-value="42"}.

## Citations

This is a citation reference [@smith2020] and multiple citations [@jones2021; @doe2022].

## Footnotes

This is a sentence with a footnote^[This is the footnote text.] embedded in it.

## Quoted Text

She said 'Hello' using single quotes.

He replied "World" using double quotes.

## Strikeout

This text has ~~strikethrough~~ formatting.

## Superscript and Subscript

The formula is E = mc^2^ for superscript.

The chemical formula is H~2~O for subscript.

## SmallCaps

This text uses [small caps]{.smallcaps} formatting.

## Underline

This text has [underlined]{.underline} formatting.

## RawInline

This paragraph contains `<span class="raw">raw HTML</span>`{=html} inline.

This paragraph contains `\textrm{raw LaTeX}`{=latex} inline.

that continues on the next line.

This is a line with a hard break\
